story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1101_0100_20: On the day of the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I hereby announce that the Arceus Cup is
under way!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
This time, as previously announced, we are
holding a tournament just for Gym Leaders!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We chose these eight Gym Leaders from a
pool of eligible Trainers!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Trainers will compete in two tournament
blocks!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Furthermore, to prevent competitors from
learning their opponents’ strategies before
battle...
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
we’ll be holding matches simultaneously in
separate venues!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Competitors must choose just one Pokémon
to battle with—one they have the strongest
bond with!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Without further ado, allow me to introduce
the competitors who’ll be showing Arceus
their bonds!
story_arceus_08_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: Contestants! I wish you the best!
